sc.plugin2017.gui

Class Observation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.plugin2017.gui.Observation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sc.guiplugin.interfaces.IObservation, sc.networking.clients.IUpdateListener, IGUIObservation

    public class Observation
extends java.lang.Object
implements sc.guiplugin.interfaces.IObservation, sc.networking.clients.IUpdateListener, IGUIObservation
    The observation watches the game and is informed by the GUI client when something happens
    Author:
    ffi
